00024 #ifndef _XMLWRITER_HPP_
00025 #define _XMLWRITER_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "boost/shared_ptr.hpp"
00029 #include "boost/iostreams/positioning.hpp"
00030 #include <iosfwd>
00031 #include <string>
00032 #include <vector>
00033 
00034 
00035 namespace pwiz {
00036 namespace minimxml {
00037 
00038 
00039 ///
00040 /// The XMLWriter class provides simple, tag-level XML syntax writing.
00041 /// Internally, XMLWriter keeps a style stack (for client customization
00042 /// of the XML style) and an element stack (for element nesting/indentation). 
00043 ///
00044 class XMLWriter
00045 {
00046     public:
00047 
00048     /// flags to control the XML writing style
00049     enum StyleFlag
00050     {
00051         StyleFlag_InlineInner = 0x01, // no whitespace within an element 
00052         StyleFlag_InlineOuter = 0x02, // no whitespace around an element
00053         StyleFlag_Inline = StyleFlag_InlineInner | StyleFlag_InlineOuter,
00054         StyleFlag_AttributesOnMultipleLines = 0x04
00055     };
00056 
00057     /// interface to allow outside observation of data sent to output stream 
00058     class OutputObserver
00059     {
00060         public:
00061         virtual void update(const std::string& output) = 0;
00062         virtual ~OutputObserver(){}
00063     };
00064 
00065     /// initial configuration of the XMLWriter
00066     struct Config
00067     {
00068         unsigned int initialStyle;
00069         unsigned int indentationStep;
00070         OutputObserver* outputObserver;
00071 
00072         Config()
00073         :   initialStyle(0), indentationStep(2), outputObserver(0)
00074         {}
00075     };
00076 
00077     /// constructor
00078     XMLWriter(std::ostream& os, const Config& config = Config());
00079 
00080     /// pushes style flags onto the internal style stack
00081     void pushStyle(unsigned int flags);
00082 
00083     /// pops the style stack
00084     void popStyle();
00085 
00086     /// writes a processing instruction
00087     void processingInstruction(const std::string& name, const std::string& data);
00088 
00089     typedef std::vector< std::pair<std::string,std::string> > Attributes;
00090 
00091     /// tag for indicating an empty element
00092     enum EmptyElementTag {NotEmptyElement, EmptyElement};
00093 
00094     /// writes element start tag
00095     void startElement(const std::string& name, 
00096                       const Attributes& attributes = Attributes(),
00097                       EmptyElementTag emptyElementTag = NotEmptyElement);
00098 
00099     /// writes element end tag
00100     void endElement();
00101 
00102     /// writes character data
00103     void characters(const std::string& text);
00104 
00105     typedef boost::iostreams::stream_offset stream_offset;
00106 
00107     /// returns current stream position
00108     stream_offset position() const;
00109 
00110     /// returns stream position of next element start tag 
00111     stream_offset positionNext() const;
00112 
00113 
00114     private:
00115     class Impl;
00116     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00117     XMLWriter(const XMLWriter&);
00118     XMLWriter& operator=(const XMLWriter&);
00119 };
00120     
00121 
00122 } // namespace minimxml
00123 } // namespace pwiz
00124 
00125 
00126 #endif // _XMLWRITER_HPP_
